text: University of North Carolina at Asheville is a co-educational, public liberal arts university in Asheville, North Carolina. The university has about 3,644 students. It was founded in 1927. The current chancellor of the university is Kimberly van Noort. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bulldogs. They have 6 varsity teams for men and 6 for women, most of which compete in the Big South Conference. ==Other websites== *University of North Carolina at Asheville's Official website *UNC Asheville Bulldogs' Official athletics website Category:Colleges and universities in North Carolina Category:1927 establishments in the United States Category:20th- century establishments in North Carolina Category:Asheville, North Carolina
title: University of North Carolina at Asheville
